body_html:
Seems reasonable (we can always add a 4th argument with default=None); though I wonder if we can just pull a name from the name scope of the indices tensor. sherry, think it's reasonable to add ser/de for SparseTensors?
…

body:
Seems reasonable (we can always add a 4th argument with default=None);
though I wonder if we can just pull a name from the name scope of the
indices tensor.  sherry, think it's reasonable to add ser/de for
SparseTensors?

On Fri, Mar 10, 2017 at 2:23 PM, Zongheng Yang <notifications@github.com>
